attributes.action: do regular checks on those who are claiming single parent income support
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as the once a year check or whatever it is they do is not enough. too many people get away with this benefit and get away with paying absolutely nothing, unlike us who pay to have our houses. these people usually have their partners living with them, get pregnant , claim more benefits and no one ever thinks any thing of it.
